ACCESS_ITEM_LOGIN_TAG_TOOLTIP: This item has item login enabled. New users can access this item when they authenticate using the item login.
ACCESS_PUBLIC_TAG_TOOLTIP: This item is public. Anyone can access this item.
COPY_ITEM_MODAL_TITLE: Where do you want to copy this item?
CREATE_NEW_ITEM_ETHERPAD_INFORMATIONS: Etherpad is a collaborative real-time text editor
CREATE_SHORTCUT_MODAL_TITLE: Where do you want to create the shortcut?
CROP_IMAGE_MODAL_CONTENT_TEXT: Crop your chosen image to fit the image size requirements.
DELETE_ITEM_MODAL_CONTENT_one: This item will be deleted permanently.
DELETE_ITEM_MODAL_CONTENT_other: These items will be deleted permanently.
FLAG_ITEM_REASON_TITLE: Select reason for flagging this item
HIDE_ITEM_HIDDEN_PARENT_INFORMATION: This item is hidden because its parent item is hidden.
IMPORT_H5P_INFORMATIONS: You can upload H5P rich content by uploading exported .h5p files (e.g. from H5P.com, external Moodle services, etc).
IMPORT_H5P_LIMITATIONS_TEXT: You can upload up to one H5P of {{maxSize}} at a time.
IMPORT_H5P_WARNING: Once your file is accepted, it will take several minutes for all imported files to be available.
IMPORT_ZIP_INFORMATION: You can download your resources from graasp.eu by right clicking and choosing "Download as ZIP".
IMPORT_ZIP_LIMITATIONS_TEXT: You can upload up to one ZIP of {{maxSize}} at a time. On error, try to upload a smaller zip.
IMPORT_ZIP_WARNING: Once your file is accepted, it will take several minutes for it to be available.
INVITATIONS_TABLE_CANNOT_DELETE_PARENT_T: This invitation is defined in the parent item and cannot be deleted here.
ITEM_MEMBERSHIPS_TABLE_CANNOT_DELETE_PAR: This membership is defined in the parent item and cannot be deleted here.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_ATTRIBUTION_TITLE: Do you want attribution for your work?
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_REQUIRE_ATTRIBUTION_OPT: Yes. Anyone using my work must include proper attribution.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_CC0_OPTION_LABEL: No. Anyone can use my work, even without giving me attribution.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_COMMERCIAL_TITLE: Do you want to allow others to use your work commercially?
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_ALLOW_COMMERCIAL_OPTION: Yes. Others can use my work, even for commercial purposes.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_DISALLOW_COMMERCIAL_OPT: No. Others can not use my work for commercial purposes.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_REMIX_TITLE: Do you want to allow others to remix, adapt, or build upon your work?
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_ALLOW_REMIX_OPTION_LABE: Yes. Others can remix, adapt, or build upon my work.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_ALLOW_SHARE_ALIKE_REMIX: Yes, as long as others share alike in a compatible license.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_DISALLOW_REMIX_OPTION_L: No. Others may only use my work in unadapted form.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_LICENSE_INFORMATIONS:
All content published on Graasp Library does not allow commercial use.
 Allow adaptations of your work to be shared?
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_LICENSE_MODAL_CONTENT: Please verify that your item fits the CC License, and do not change to a more restricted option.
ITEM_SETTINGS_CC_LICENSE_MORE_INFORMATIO: Need more info about CC License? Click here!
ITEM_SETTINGS_CO_EDITORS_INFORMATIONS: Do you want to display co-editors after published? All users with edit permission will be displayed.
ITEM_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_CANNOT_EDIT_PAR: You cannot modify the visibility because it is defined in one of the parent of this item.
ITEM_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_PRIVATE_INFORMA: This item is private. Only authorized members can access it.
ITEM_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_PSEUDONYMIZED_S: This item is accessible if the visitor provides a
ITEM_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_PUBLIC_INFORMAT:
This item is public. Anyone can access it.
 Note: Items will be unpublished automatically if you change the visibility state from public to others.
ITEM_TAGS_INFORMATION: Please seperate tags by comma. Eg. English, Biology, Lab, Plants, ..., Demo
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_INFORMATION:
You can publish your collection to Graasp Library, our open educational resource library.
Published collections are accessible by the public.
To publish your collection, please follow the three steps below.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_NOT_PUBLISHED_ITEM_MESS: Only users with admin rights can publish this item and validate it.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_PUBLISH_NOTIFICATIONS_L: Send email notifications to all co-editors
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_PUBLISHED_STATUS: This element is published. Anyone can access it and is available on Graasp Library, our public repository of learning ressources.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_CHILD_PUBLISHED_STATUS: This element is part of a collection that is already published. Publishing and un-publishing can be done at the collection root.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_CONFIGURATIO: Set the options for your resource to make it easily accessible to the public.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_INFORMATIONS: You need to validate your item before publishing it. Please allow some time for the validation to finish.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_PUBLICATION_: Once your item is validated, you can publish your item by clicking the button.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_STATUS_FAILU: Your item might contain inappropriate content. Please remove them and validate your item again. If you have any question, please contact {{contact, string}}.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VALIDATION_STATUS_PENDI: Your item is pending automatic validation. Once the validation succeeds, you will be able to publish your item.
Your item failed the automatic validation. A member of our team will manually check your collection, please wait for the result.
LIBRARY_SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_INFORMATIONS: This element must be public to be published
MOVE_ITEM_MODAL_TITLE: Where do you want to move this item?
SETTINGS_LINK_SETTINGS_INFORMATIONS: If both setting are disabled, a button will be displayed by default.
SETTINGS_LINK_SHOW_IFRAME: Show Link Iframe (some websites prevent this feature)
SETTINGS_THUMBNAIL_SETTINGS_INFORMATIONS: Provide an image to update the thumbnail. You might need to refresh the page to see the changes.
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE: The import failed for these entries
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_IMPORT_MODAL_CONTENT:
Your CSV should have at least the column 'email'. The columns 'name' and 'permission' are optional.
 A CSV entry cannot override the data already saved. If a user already has permission, update the value in the table manually.
SHARE_ITEM_CSV_IMPORT_MODAL_TITLE: Import users from a CSV file
SHARE_ITEM_FORM_INVITATION_EMAIL_EXISTS_: This user already has access to this item
SHARE_ITEM_FORM_INVITATION_TOOLTIP: Non-registered users will receive a personal link to register on the platform.
SHARED_MEMBERS_TOOLTIP_one: This item is shared with one user
SHARED_MEMBERS_TOOLTIP_other: This item is shared with {{count}} users
SHARING_AUTHENTICATED_MEMBERS_EMPTY_MESS: No user has authenticated to this item yet.
SHARING_AUTHORIZED_MEMBERS_EMPTY_MESSAGE: No user has access to this item.
SHARING_INVITATIONS_EMPTY_MESSAGE: No invitation for this item yet.
UPLOAD_FILE_INFORMATIONS: If you drag-and-drop zip or H5P archives, or if you import as a new "FILE", they will be stored as such. To expand and use them, use the special "IMPORT ZIP" or "IMPORT H5P" option.
UPLOAD_FILE_LIMITATIONS_TEXT: You can upload up to {{maxFiles}} files of {{maxSize}} at a time.
